Scriptal.Name: Send Command
Scriptal.Description:
Sends any GameObject Command to any GameObject. See https://mgsvmoddingwiki.github.io/Commands/ for notes on various commmands. Also refer to _sequence.lua files from the base game's mission packs, where most of the mission-specific logic is scripted.
- For most events, 'arg1' represents the GameObjectId that sent the event. For GeoTraps, 'arg2' is the GameObjectId that entered/exited.
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: local tempGameObjectIdVal = |[1|STRING,NUMBER]| if type(tempGameObjectIdVal) == "string" then tempGameObjectIdVal = GetGameObjectId(tempGameObjectIdVal) end if |[3|STRING,NUMBER,BOOLEAN,TABLE,NIL]| == nil then GameObject.SendCommand(tempGameObjectIdVal, |[2|TABLE]|) else |[3|STRING,NUMBER,BOOLEAN,TABLE,NIL]| = GameObject.SendCommand(tempGameObjectIdVal, |[2|TABLE]|) end

Choice.Name: Game Object
Choice.Description: The Game Object (their name or GameObjectId) to receive the commmand.

Choice.Name: Command
Choice.Description: A command to the GameObject, in the form of a table. Consists of an "id" string and typically various arguments (enabled = true, route = "routeName", etc.)

Choice.Name: (Optional) Result Storage Variable
Choice.Description:
Some commands return values (GetPosition, GetCurrentLife, etc.) which can be optionally stored to this variable.
- Set to "nil" to disregard the return value.
Warning: due to the ambiguous value type of the response, any variable type is accepted for this choice. However, this may cause type inconsistencies if the command returns a mismatching value type. It is recommended to know exactly what type of value will be returned from the command, so that the variable type can match.
